review_data.title: Nice place for a great coffee
review_data.content: Nice italian restaurant in the heart of Zürich. Staff was very friendly, food looked good (unfortunately I did not have time to eat) but the coffee was great!

review_data.title: A true hidden gem right in the heart of Zurich
